name: Fast Moto Racer
description:
Fast Moto Racer is a best Moto traffic racing type with simple control, cool graphic and addictive sound effect.


* Tilt the phone to control the Moto
* Use nitro to boost your Moto
* Collect Nitro boost to increase nitro time
* Collect Magnet to get coin easier
* Collect coins to unlock new Moto
